movie.title: 20th Century Girl
movie.desc: Set in 1999, the story revolves around Na Bo-ra (Kim Yoo-jung), a seventeen-year-old high school student with a bright personality.

movie.title: The Pirates: The Last Royal Treasure
movie.desc: Moo-chi (Kang Ha-neul), the head of the bandits, who claims to be the best swordsman in Goryeo, and Hae-rang (Han Hyo-joo), the owner of a pirate ship that conquered the sea.

movie.title: Your name
movie.desc: In depicts the story of high school students Taki Tachibana and Mitsuha Miyamizu, who suddenly begin to swap bodies despite having never met, unleashing chaos on each other's lives.

movie.title: Recalled
movie.desc: Soo-jin (Seo Yea-ji) is involved in an accident and loses her memory. She begins to see the future and as illusions start becoming reality, her confusing memories bring her face-to-face with a truth about her husband Ji-hoon (Kim Kang-woo).

movie.title: Night in Paradise
movie.desc: It tells the story of Tae-gu. In retaliation, Tae-gu's sister and niece are murdered, causing him to seek revenge by brutally killing Chairman Doh and his men before fleeing to Jeju Island.

movie.title: The Witch: The Subversion
movie.desc: A young girl escapes from a mysterious laboratory after a violent incident that leaves many dead. The girl collapses on a farm, where she is discovered by the owner, Mr. and Mrs. Goo.

movie.title: The Witch: The Other One
movie.desc: A young girl escapes from a mysterious laboratory after a violent incident that leaves many dead. Two members that run the lab, Dr. Baek and Mr. Choi, considered her dead. The girl collapses on a farm, where she is discovered by the owner, Mr. and Mrs. Goo.

movie.title: The Divine Fury
movie.desc: The film tells the story of Yong-hoo (Park Seo-joon), a martial arts champion who gains divine powers to fight against a powerful evil force.

movie.title: Midnight Runners
movie.desc: Two friends who are students at Korean National Police University, find themselves in an endless race against time after they witness a kidnapping and decide to use their knowledge.
